1.content:
A strange building towers into the sky, slightly left from the middle of nowhere.

The front's prismatic surface refracts the light, covering the area in a multi-coloured pattern, that slowly alters, according to the sun's movement.

You follow a narrow path, leading to the entry doors which slide aside, barely audible. There are some big red signs to the left and right, one of them says 'no male predators', another one reads 'no hardvore', and the last two are signed with 'no shredding' and 'no smoking'. Looking further around, you see a small counter.

Sitting on it is a small dragon, around ten inches in length, smiling at you with kaleidoscopic sparkling eyes. He nods at you.

"Welcome to the V.o.r.e.-agency Headquarters. I'm your host, Pegadygor.

Here you can find almost anything your heart desires.. if it is vorish in nature, at last... please, take a look at our staff and our offers," he points his head to a computerscreen on the counter, the words Touch here flashing in white letters.
After you finish browsing through the Database the little glitter-dragon hands you two forms.

"Please, fill in the appropriate form and hand it back to me. After that take a seat, have a drink, and feel free to chat a little with our employees not involved in anything.

Currently there are four rooms available, two of them reserved for predators seeking for prey, and two of them for prey seeking to be eaten... Oh, and if you have a friend you'd like to surprise.. well, fill in her or his data, and not yours

As soon as itis your turn we will call you out, but if you do not move into a room, or do not move while being there, our automatic laziness detector will teleport you out of the building. Oh, and if you are a reforming pred, I'm sorry... those crystals on the outside of our little home prevent reforming inside these walls, therefore you'll have to line up again, too. On the other hand even digested preys will be recreated if they want to be, as we tend to store memory-records and DNA-samples in our CPU, too.

If you have any questions, just ask, I'll be right here..." And with a nod he hands you the forms.
1.title: Introduction

"Yes, sir" Mae nodded politely in acknowledgment as she got up and headed to the indicated area. She had a slight feeling of fright and apprehension as she approached the room but she quickly dismissed that as she entered.

The room had been set up just the way the luring Irene preferred it. A huge, cave-like area, which was much to larger than it should have been, at least judging by the building's exterior.

Carefully watching the door as it opened she licked her lips in anticipation...and was a bit dissapointed that her meal was just a mouse, and not anything really big.. but she won't be picky about this.

Mae looke back in confusion before turning around slowly. "H-hello?"

The door closed after Mae, capturing her inside the room. In the shadows deeper in the cavern was a movement. Something big was sitting, or standing, there, laying a glazing stare on her.

Waiting just a little longer for the mousegirl to come closer, the huge Irene prepared her attack, her huge mouth in her lower belly already drooling.
